PackageOracle.name: DA_BILLING_CYCLE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BILLING_CYCLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.40.119854000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_cycle_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_cycle_desc IN VARCHAR2
,billing_cycle_frequency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_cycle_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_billing_cycle;

body.name: DA_BILLING_CYCLE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BILLING_CYCLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.40.129489000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_cycle_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_cycle_desc IN VARCHAR2
,billing_cycle_frequency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_cycle.add, parms=' || billing_cycle_id || '|' || billing_cycle_desc || '|' || billing_cycle_frequency_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_cycle a
(
a.billing_cycle_id
,a.billing_cycle_desc
,a.billing_cycle_frequency_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.billing_cycle_id
,add.billing_cycle_desc
,add.billing_cycle_frequency_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_cycle.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_cycle_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_cycle.del, parms=' || billing_cycle_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_billing_cycle a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billing_cycle_id = del.billing_cycle_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_cycle.del');

END del;

END da_billing_cycle;
